item.title: Scraping Google News with 'rvest'
item.description: This is an example of how to scrape Google News website with the awesome rvest package. This work is the result of a question that appear in the WhatsApp group of our blog R Dojo. A user in the group came up with this problem and I decided to help him. It was a cool challenge, so why not? I should advice you that a great deal of the basic ideas comes from his own code.
